mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATE ( NO, activityname, writer, meetingplace, meetingtime, meetingdate, peoplemaxnum, startzone, endzone, starttime, endtime, content, regdate, updatedate, image, regular) values(pk_find.nextval,#{activityname},#{writer},#{meetingplace},#{meetingtime},(to_date(sysdate, 'YY/MM/DD')),#{peoplemaxnum}, #{startzone},#{endzone},#{starttime},#{endtime},#{content},sysdate,sysdate,#{image},#{regular})
